channel.title: Changing the hp/hits of monsters? how to
channel.description: I'll got a gsminigame..u guys know just kill monsters and u get into another place and kill again,again,again till u need to get a key from a monster ..use the key on a chest and u get the reward..but its to easy to kill them! so I want to change the hp of the monsters and the hits the monsters can do on us.. if anyone could help me! PLEASE, reply

the member thing is fixed…thanks to all guys who helped me!

still need some help with the npc thing…

btw sorry legend-scape but yesterday no one helped me tho…

item.title: Changing the hp/hits of monsters? how to
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

playerIsMember = 1;

This must go for the portal & the character file.
